ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate, thawed
1 (2 liter) bottle grapefruit flavored soda, chilled
des: "This punch was made famous by one of the ladies in my Bunko group, but has now become a favorite for all occasions! Add frozen, chopped fruit chunks to the mix after 'slushing' for a healthy (ha ha) boost!"
ins: Mix together the tea, water, vodka, orange juice concentrate, and pink lemonade concentrate in a large freezer-proof bowl, such as glass or stainless steel, and freeze overnight or several days ahead. With a fork, scrape the frozen mixture into a slush; pour the grapefruit soda into the slushy mixture, and stir. Keep cold in an ice chest.
